attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Anti-Smoking Legislation has affected the publican trade and associated industries. I supply gaming machines to these establishments and have seen my takings dwindle away to nothing. 

The Prime Minister should repeal the Anti-Smoking Legislation at once and give people back their choices - No more nanny state !!!

How many more trades allied to the brewery trade are going to be damaged before this Government decides to listen.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
